name: Unkillable
summary: You're relentless and nigh unkillable, shrugging off blows that should destroy you, though they might make your body start to fall apart.
description:
You're relentless and nigh unkillable, shrugging off blows that should destroy you, though they might make your body start to fall apart. You are reduced to 1 HP instead of 0 HP. You must succeed at a DC 6 flat check or your body deteriorates.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: You would be reduced to 0 HP.
